title: shashank2122/Local-Voice
summary: A real-time, offline voice assistant for Linux and Raspberry Pi. Uses local LLMs (via Ollama), speech-to-text (Vosk), and text-to-speech (Piper) for fast, wake-free voice interaction. No cloud. No APIs. Just Python, a mic, and your voice.

title: arrase/ollama-agent
summary: Ollama Agent is a powerful command-line tool (CLI and REPL) that allows you to interact with local AI models.

title: cryptokid980/homelab-2-prod-ai-golden-path
summary: This is a golden path (opinionated shortcut) to explore AI from local homelab to PROD using OSS for technological independence and local LLM for privacy. We explore concepts like AI agents, RAG and LLM using OSS technologies like Linux, Opentofu, microk8s, DAPR, Ollama, TimescaleDB & pgai Vectorizer, Flask and Python.

title: bug-ops/zeph
summary: Lightweight AI agent runtime in Rust — hybrid inference (Ollama, Claude, OpenAI, HuggingFace), multi-model orchestration, skill-based tool use with self-learning, semantic memory via Qdrant, code RAG with   tree-sitter, MCP client, A2A protocol. CLI + Telegram + TUI

title: nkhoit/dcss-ai
summary: Autonomous AI agent that plays Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup, learns from every death, and streams on Twitch.

title: Bazinga23451/semantic-qa-gen
summary: A Python library for generating high-quality question-answer pairs from PDF, DOCX, MD, and TXT files

title: wronai/code2logic
summary: Code2Logic analyzes codebases and generates compact, LLM-friendly representations with semantic understanding. Perfect for feeding project context to AI assistants, building code documentation, or analyzing code structure.

title: BluBluBlaBla/vidsummize
summary: Vidsummize

title: jjhickman/garbanzo-bot
summary: Garbanzo: reusable community AI chat app for WhatsApp with configurable provider failover, setup wizard, and Docker-first deployment.

title: syklon99/ai-chatbot-svelte
summary: A full-featured, hackable SvelteKit AI chatbot built by Vercel

title: Uragon005/ai-chatbot-svelte
summary: A full-featured, hackable SvelteKit AI chatbot built by Vercel

title: 2501Pr0ject/RAGnarok-AI
summary: Local-first RAG evaluation framework for LLM applications. 100% local, no API keys required.

title: LearningCircuit/local-deep-research
summary: Local Deep Research achieves ~95% on SimpleQA benchmark (tested with GPT-4.1-mini). Supports local and cloud LLMs (Ollama, Google, Anthropic, ...). Searches 10+ sources - arXiv, PubMed, web, and your private documents. Everything Local & Encrypted.

title: 4foureyes/avallama
summary: Cross-platform local AI desktop app powered by Ollama

title: K31NER/ScrapyJob-Insight
summary: Agente de IA especializado en el análisis del mercado laboral. Extrae ofertas en tiempo real mediante web scraping y utiliza modelos de lenguaje (LLMs) para transformar descripciones de empleo en datos estructurados y accionables.

title: Fortyseven/chit-v2
summary: Chit is a lightweight privacy-focused web chat front-end for Ollama endpoints that uses no backend.

title: yigit-guven/Synapse-AI
summary: Synapse AI combines local LLMs with vector search to transform your private documents into a searchable, interactive database. Get accurate, context-aware answers instantly; all without your data ever leaving your machine.

title: darkzard05/rag-system-ollama
summary: Advanced local-first RAG system powered by Ollama and LangGraph. Optimized for high-performance sLLM orchestration   featuring adaptive intent routing, semantic chunking, intelligent hybrid search (FAISS + BM25), and real-time thought   streaming. Includes integrated PDF analysis and secure vector caching.

title: amankumarconnect/mini-tsenta
summary: Automated job application bot for WorkAtAStartup.com. Parses your resume, uses local LLMs to match relevant jobs via semantic similarity, and auto-fills applications with AI-generated cover letters.

title: danmurf/instantcoffee
summary: Instant Coffee ☕ - Turn plain English into beautiful diagrams instantly using local AI. No signup, no API keys, just describe what you want and watch it render.
